titleStmt.title: Gods great and wonderful work in Somerset-shire, or, The charitable farmer miraculously rewarded happening at Welling within three miles of Wells this last harvest : where an honest Godly person ... was recompensed by an extraordinary crop of wheat ... : published as a grateful acknowledgement of the goodness of Providence ...

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Miraculous news from Summerset-shire.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
